passages.name: Start
passages.text:
The scene: your room.
The subject: the plastic play pen full of THREE foster kittens you've been taking care of 
The inciting incident: the kittens have escaped!

Oh dear! They're mewing all over the place-- under your bed and in your closet. What do you do?

[[Check under the bed]]
[[Go peek in the closet]]
[[Close the pen first, duh!]]

passages.name: Check under the bed
passages.text:
You check under the bed. Two brother, HOCUS and POCUS, are hiding behind your box of cables. When you pull them both out, even though they're supposed to be white, they're gray, and you realize they're covered in dust bunnies..... whoops...

[[Put the cat(s) back in the pen]]

links.text: Put the cat(s) back in the pen

destination.name: Put the cat(s) back in the pen

passages.name: Go peek in the closet
passages.text:
You carefully slide the door to your closet open, mindful that it's a little too stuffed full of clothes at this point to open all the way. Inside is Toast, the runt of the litter, hiding in a shoebox. You pick her up. 

[[Put the cat(s) back in the pen]]

links.text: Put the cat(s) back in the pen

destination.name: Put the cat(s) back in the pen

passages.name: Close the pen first, duh!
passages.text:
You close the plastic gate to the pen. Now they can't get back out! Good. Now time to get those kitties back! 

[[Check under the bed]] 
[[Go peek in the closet]]

passages.name: Put the cat(s) back in the pen
passages.text:
You look down at the pen. Are there any still missing?

[[No, all caught!]]
[[Wait a minute, I still hear some meowing!]]

links.text: Wait a minute, I still hear some meowing!

passages.name: No, all caught!
passages.text: Yay!! You got all the cats back :)
